gravure.pygutenprint.array module¶

Module gravure.pygutenprint.array.

class Array¶

Bases: gravure.pygutenprint.sequence.Sequence

Array(data=None, low=None, high=None, *args, **kwargs) The array is a simple “two-dimensional array of numbers”.

Array “inherits” from Sequence object.

param data:an optional python array like object to initialize the array. if None the size of the Array will be set with the size paramater.
param size:a tuple (x_size, y_size), the total size of the array will be (x_size * y_size). If date was specified, size will have no effect.
param low:a number to set the low boundary.
param high:a number to set the high boundary.
returns:the newly created Array.
raises:MemmoryError.
copy(self)¶

Return a copy of this Array.

A new Array will be created, and then the contents of self will be copied into it.

Returns:the new copy of the SeArrayquence.
copy_in(self, dest)¶

Copy this Array in dest.

dest must be a valid Array previously instancied with dest = Array().

Parameters:dest – dest the destination Array.
itemsize¶

readonly property itemsize

Returns:A integers giving the size in bytes of each elements.
nbytes¶

readonly property nbytes

Returns:The total length in bytes of the array buffer
set_data(self, data)¶

Set the data in the array.

Parameters:data – a python array like object implementing the buffer interface.
Raises:ValueError if None or with an array with a

not supported type.

set_size(self, size)¶

Resize an array.

Resizing an array will destroy all data stored in the array.

Parameters:size – a tuple (x_size, y_size) that define the new array shape.
Raises:MemmoryError.
shape¶

readonly property shape

Returns:a tuple with the array dimensions.
size¶

readonly property size

Returns:The total number of element in the array
strides¶

readonly property strides

Returns:A tuple of integers giving the size in bytes to access each element for each dimension of the array
